meanings.sent1: The widemouthed frog caught many insects with its big mouth.
meanings.sent2: The widemouthed pitcher plant easily traps insects inside.
meanings.sent3: The widemouthed fish told jokes that made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The widemouthed canyon seemed to swallow the entire landscape.
meanings.sent5: The widemouthed smile of the child brightened up the room.

meanings.definition: Characterized by a wide opening or entrance
meanings.sent1: The widemouthed cave was dark and mysterious.
meanings.sent2: The widemouthed jar could hold a lot of cookies.
meanings.sent3: The widemouthed tunnel echoed with the sound of footsteps.
meanings.sent4: The widemouthed umbrella shielded them from the rain.
meanings.sent5: The widemouthed doorway welcomed guests into the grand hall.
